Please note that the RTE component is uncontrolled because the UUI RTE is based on Slate.js, which is also an uncontrolled editor. 

Although the UUI implementation does have limited support for updating the editor's value from the outside, such as in cases where the value changes from empty to a new one (as might occur after loading a state from the backend), we still do not recommend relying on this mechanism and advise avoiding external updates to the editor state.
